content: वर्ण् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (वर्णयति-ते, वर्णित) {@--1@} To colour, paint, dye; यथा हि भरता वर्णैर्वर्णयंत्यात्मनस्तनुं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--2@} To describe, relate, explain, write, depict delineate, illustrate; वर्णितं जयदेवेन हरोरिदं प्रणतेन <ls>Gīt. 3</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 18.</ls> {@--3@} To praise; extol. {@--4@} To spread, extend. {@--5@} To illuminate. {@--6@} To exert oneself. {@--7@} To send, cast. {@--8@} To pound, grind.
